name: iFUNK - CARDINAL RED
description:
They use to use an apple for love and sexuality... I use it for the of my dreams... You see half the #elafunkclothin symbol in the corner. The apple also signifies totality... I dont just make stuff... Everything gotta have a meaning to me...

#factsnofiction #knowledgeispower

--------------------------------- 
---------------------------------

-5.6 oz., 50% preshrunk cotton, 50% polyester 
-Gildan DryBlend™ 
-fabric wicks moisture away from the body 
-Double-needle stitching throughout 
-Taped shoulder-to-shoulder 
-Seamless collar
